entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JsonSerializerIsReflectionDisabled exception in Blazor despite using Source Generator. #56752
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_ef, https #56751
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #56750
  • Document how to disable display templates using UIHintAttribute #56747
  • [Blazor] MapStaticAssets incorrectly re-encodes files when running the published output in the development environment. #56742
    .NET 10 Planning
  • CascadingValueSource crashes because subscriber are added asynchronously #56741
    9.0-rc1
  • Navigate to incorrect URL when launch the .NET 9.0 Web API project with IIS Express. #56740
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #56739
  • I just want to ask, in blaozr wasm, why can't we use httpclient to carry the windows identity, but use the browser's featch can and don't need to set up, you don't want us to continue to use wasm, is it? #56736

Closed

  • MinimalApis using MapGroup are not exposed by the .NET 9 WithOpenApi method #56585
  • OpenAPI Vs Swashbuckle #56711
  • Configuring Jwt Bearer Authority with simplified authentication configuration leads to degraded security #53423
    9.0-preview7
  • Perf regression: single_query #56718
  • Perf regression: fortunes #56671
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #56738
  • Fixes to generated schemas for some primitive types #56730
  • `services.AddDefaultIdentity(configureIdentityOptions, configureAuthenticationOptions)` #44364
    Backlog
  • Blazor DotNetStreamReference Race condition when arrayBuffer is not awaited/read in javascript with using keyword. #53376
    9.0-preview7
  • Minimal API Endpoint gives "Invalid antiforgery token" error #56687
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #56728
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #56729
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi v9.0.0-preview.6.24328.4 is generating schemas for primitive types #56735
  • Consider replacing AddRouting with AddRoutingCore in AddConnections #56559
  • Mapping same SignalR hub twice results in unexpected error #56652

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for CreateSchemaReferenceId option #56753
    area-web-frameworks
  • update tsaconfig #56749
    area-infrastructure
  • [Templates][Identity] Update jquery-validation to 1.20.1 #56744
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Port fix for #53423 to `main` #56702
    area-security, 9.0-preview7
  • Enable internal runtimes and disable old creds #56428
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview7
  • Fix type/formats for primitive types #56745
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview7
  • AddConnections: AddRouting -> AddRoutingCore #56703
    area-signalr, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Support key deletion in Data Protection #53860
    area-dataprotection
  • Add support for the Partitioned cookie attribute #55371
    area-networking
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Enable input number component to support type='range' attribute #55583
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add support for trusting dev certs on linux #56582
    area-networking
  • [Infrastructure] Update jquery validate periodically #56725
    area-mvc
  • Add disable HTTP metrics endpoint metadata #56036
    area-hosting
  • Improve performance of UriHelper.GetDisplayUrl #55611
    Perf, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Do not close connection for http1.0 when client request connection keep-alive #56558
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Navigation Exception: Introduce Clear Message #56644
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Improve endpoint extension method docs #56713
    area-networking
